alert.note: Alert for Meade; Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:45AM MDT until May 12 at 3:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Ziebach County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Southeastern Perkins County in northwestern South Dakota... * Until 330 AM MDT. * At 245 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Durkee Lake to 10 miles southeast of Faith to 6 miles east of Red Scaffold, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Intersection of Cherry Creek and Sunnybrook Roads around 255 AM MDT. Red Elm around 300 AM MDT. Dupree and Iron Lightning around 305 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include South Eagle Butte and Thunder Butte. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
